node.name: pointcloud_to_laserscan
node.rosparam:
target_frame: camera_link # Leave disabled to output scan in pointcloud frame transform_tolerance: 0.01 min_height: 0.0 max_height: 1.0
angle_min: -1.5708 # -M_PI/2 angle_max: 1.5708 # M_PI/2 angle_increment: 0.0087 # M_PI/360.0 scan_time: 0.3333 range_min: 0.45 range_max: 4.0 use_inf: true inf_epsilon: 1.0
# Concurrency level, affects number of pointclouds queued for processing, thread number governed by nodelet manager # 0 : Detect number of cores # 1 : Single threaded # 2->inf : Parallelism level concurrency_level: 1
